review-mode-toggle.title: Review Mode
review-mode-toggle.text: Enable to access comment threads, status changes, and collaborative review features.

username-field.title: Your Username
username-field.text: Your username identifies your comments and creates your personal review branch: reviews/{package}/{username}

package-context-badge.title: Active Package
package-context-badge.text: Shows which review package you're currently working in. All comments will be associated with this package.

package-filter-toggle.title: Package Filter
package-filter-toggle.text: When enabled, only shows REQs that are in the active package.

packages-header.title: Review Packages
packages-header.text: Packages group related REQs for review. Create packages for sprints, releases, or feature reviews.

new-package-button.title: Create Package
new-package-button.text: Create a new review package. You'll be prompted for a name and description.

package-item.title: Package
package-item.text: Click to activate this package. Your branch will switch to reviews/{package-id}/{username}.

package-req-count.title: REQ Count
package-req-count.text: Number of requirements included in this package.

archive-button.title: Archive Package
archive-button.text: Move this package to the archive. All threads and comments are preserved for audit purposes.

archived-packages-section.title: Archived Packages
archived-packages-section.text: Previously archived packages. Click to view in read-only mode.

archive-reason-resolved.title: Archived: Resolved
archive-reason-resolved.text: This package was automatically archived when all threads were resolved.

archive-reason-deleted.title: Archived: Deleted
archive-reason-deleted.text: This package was archived when deleted. The review data is preserved.

archive-reason-manual.title: Archived: Manual
archive-reason-manual.text: This package was manually archived by a user.

position-type-general.title: General Position
position-type-general.text: Comment applies to the entire requirement. Use for high-level feedback.

position-type-line.title: Line Position
position-type-line.text: Anchor your comment to a specific line number. Click a line in the content view to pre-fill.

position-type-block.title: Block Position
position-type-block.text: Anchor your comment to a range of lines. Enter start and end line numbers.

position-type-word.title: Word Position
position-type-word.text: Anchor your comment to a specific word or phrase. Enter the exact text to find.

line-number-input.title: Line Number
line-number-input.text: Enter the 1-based line number. You can also click directly on a line in the content view.

block-start-input.title: Start Line
block-start-input.text: First line of the block you're commenting on.

block-end-input.title: End Line
block-end-input.text: Last line of the block you're commenting on.

keyword-input.title: Keyword/Phrase
keyword-input.text: Enter the exact word or phrase to anchor to. Case-sensitive.

occurrence-input.title: Occurrence
occurrence-input.text: If the word appears multiple times, which occurrence? (1 = first occurrence)

comment-body.title: Comment Text
comment-body.text: Write your comment using Markdown formatting. Preview is shown below.

submit-button.title: Submit Comment
submit-button.text: Save your comment. It will be committed to git and synced automatically.

position-label.title: Comment Position
position-label.text: Click to highlight this location in the REQ content.

position-warning.title: Position May Be Stale
position-warning.text: The file has changed since this comment was made. The line number may have shifted.

version-badge-modified.title: File Modified
version-badge-modified.text: The file has changed since this comment was made. Click 'Show Original' to see the original context.

version-badge-unavailable.title: Version Unavailable
version-badge-unavailable.text: Cannot retrieve the original file version. The git commit may no longer exist.

show-original-button.title: Show Original
show-original-button.text: View the file exactly as it was when this comment was made.

show-current-button.title: Show Current
show-current-button.text: Return to viewing the current version of the file.

resolve-button.title: Resolve Thread
resolve-button.text: Mark this thread as resolved when the issue has been addressed.

reopen-button.title: Reopen Thread
reopen-button.text: Reopen this resolved thread if further discussion is needed.

reply-button.title: Reply
reply-button.text: Add a response to this thread.

current-status.title: Current Status
current-status.text: The current status of this REQ as recorded in the spec file.

set-to-review-button.title: Set to Review
set-to-review-button.text: Change status to 'Review' and add this REQ to your active package.

request-status-change.title: Request Status Change
request-status-change.text: Request a formal status change that requires approval from designated approvers.

pending-request.title: Pending Request
pending-request.text: A status change has been requested and is awaiting approvals.

sync-status-synced.title: Synced
sync-status-synced.text: All your changes have been committed and pushed to the remote.

sync-status-pending.title: Changes Pending
sync-status-pending.text: You have local changes that haven't been pushed yet.

sync-status-behind.title: Behind Remote
sync-status-behind.text: The remote has changes you haven't fetched yet.

fetch-button.title: Fetch
fetch-button.text: Pull the latest changes from the remote for your branch.

push-button.title: Push
push-button.text: Push your local changes to the remote.

fetch-all-button.title: Fetch All
fetch-all-button.text: Fetch and merge comments from all contributors to this package.

contributors-list.title: Contributors
contributors-list.text: Users who have contributed to reviewing this package.

original-banner.title: Original View
original-banner.text: You are viewing the file as it was when the comment was made. This is read-only.

diff-stats.title: Changes Since Comment
diff-stats.text: Shows how many lines were added and removed since the comment was made.

archive-badge.title: Archived
archive-badge.text: This package has been archived and is read-only.

archive-meta-branch.title: Branch
archive-meta-branch.text: The git branch where this review was conducted.

archive-meta-created.title: Created
archive-meta-created.text: Git commit hash when the package was created.

archive-meta-last-reviewed.title: Last Reviewed
archive-meta-last-reviewed.text: Git commit hash of the most recent review activity.

commit-squash-warning.title: Commit Hash Warning
commit-squash-warning.text: This commit may have been squashed during merge. The hash may no longer exist in the main branch.

archive-close-button.title: Close Archive Viewer
archive-close-button.text: Return to the active review panel.
